description: Example I Ching hexagram schema - Hexagram 1, The Creative

hexagrams.judgment: The Creative works sublime success, furthering through perseverance.
hexagrams.image: The movement of heaven is full of power. Thus the superior person makes themselves strong and untiring.
hexagrams.interpretation: The Creative represents pure yang energy, the primal force of the universe. It symbolizes creative power, strength, and dynamic action. This hexagram suggests a time of great potential and the ability to manifest your will. Success comes through persistent effort and staying true to your highest principles.

line_1.interpretation: The creative force is still latent. This is not the time to act, but to gather strength and wait for the right moment.

line_2.text: Dragon appearing in the field. It furthers one to see the great person.
line_2.interpretation: The creative force begins to manifest. Seek guidance from those who are wise and experienced.

line_3.text: All day long the superior person is creatively active. At nightfall thoughts still beset them. Danger. No blame.
line_3.interpretation: Continued creative effort is necessary, but be aware of the dangers of overexertion. Balance action with reflection.

line_4.text: Wavering flight over the depths. No blame.
line_4.interpretation: A time of transition and decision. Either advance or retreat, but do not remain stuck in hesitation.

line_5.text: Flying dragon in the heavens. It furthers one to see the great person.
line_5.interpretation: The peak of creative power and influence. This is the optimal time to act and to collaborate with others of vision.

line_6.text: Arrogant dragon will have cause to repent.
line_6.interpretation: Overreaching and arrogance lead to downfall. Know when to withdraw and maintain humility.
